messages.subject: new group in South Florida
messages.msgSnippet: Hi everyone!  I would like to invite anyone who is interested in a local support group in Northern Palm Beach County/ Martin County to contact me off list at
messages.messageBody:
Hi everyone! I would like to invite anyone who is interested in a
local support group in Northern Palm Beach County/ Martin County to
contact me off list at luckiebyrd@.... Plans so far are very
loose and mostly consist of just getting together to play/talk/have
fun:) I would like this to be an inclusive group which means that
you don't have to be an unschooling family to join in the fun, but as
of now three out of four of the interested families are unschooling
families.

Happy learning

Cheryl
